actions.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment required that the Small Business Administration consult with the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to develop an outreach program to publicize the Small Business Innovation Research program to veterans returning from service and encourage veterans with appropriate technical skills to apply for SBIR grants.
purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 110-603 to would require the Small Business Administration to consult with the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to develop an outreach program to publicize the Small Business Innovation Research program to veterans returning from service and encourage veterans with appropriate technical skills to apply for SBIR grants.
